short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get quick summaries of YouTube videos with a single click. Perfect for learning, research, or saving time!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ Save Time with Instant Video Summaries! ✨
This extension adds a handy button to YouTube videos 🎥, letting you generate quick, insightful summaries with just one click! Say goodbye to endless scrolling—capture the key points in seconds! Perfect for students, researchers, or anyone short on time. ⏳

🚀 Try it now to watch videos smarter and faster! 🚀
🛠 How to Use:

    🔍 Open any YouTube video.
    🎯 Click the Summarize button below the video (next to the settings icon).
    📜 Read your quick summary on a new page with the video’s main points.

Boost your learning with concise insights in seconds! 🧠
